SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: Baltimore mayor fires police commissioner amid homicide rise
*Baltimore's state attorney, Mosby, ordered police to concentrate on the exact intersection Drug Dealer Freddie was taken into custody, and make arrests.
*Drug Dealer Freddie dies in police custody, most likely from banging his own head against the walls of the transport van.
* Riots erupt. Mayor Idiot says she'll give the rioters space to destroy.
* Mayor Idiot orders the police to stand down.
* Because of that order, Baltimore burns and cops are injured.
* Mayor Idiot throws the Baltimore police under the bus for the riots.
* Due to fear of getting thrown under the bus for doing their job again, Baltimore police stop being proactive and instead only respond to radio calls.
* Due to the police only being reactive, homicide rates in Baltimore skyrocket.
* Mayor Idiot fires one of the few within the police department that defended her the most because of rising homicide rates.

Baltimore is being run by clowns. Mosby and Mayor Idiot are about as competent as a barber with Parkinson's. I wouldn't trust these two stupid c*nts to work the fry-o-lator at Wendy's. I mean, seriously, who did these dumb whores blow to get their job? I only ask because competence and intelligence certainly wasn't a factor.

Baltimore mayor fires police commissioner amid homicide rise <a href="http://news.yahoo.com/baltimore-mayor-fires-police-commissioner-200136884.html" target="_blank">Baltimore mayor fires police commissioner amid homicide rise</a>

BALTIMORE (AP) — Baltimore's mayor fired the troubled city's police commissioner Wednesday, saying that a recent spike in homicides in the weeks after an unarmed black man died of injuries in police custody required a change in leadership.

Mayor Stephanie Rawlings-Blake thanked Police Commissioner Anthony Batts for his service — and praised the job he had done — but said growing criticism of his performance had become a "distraction" that was preventing the city from moving ahead.
